The new guidance requires disclosure of key terms of the program, including a description of the payment terms, payment timing and assets pledged as security or other forms of guarantees provided to the finance provider or intermediary.
We adopted the guidance in the first quarter of 2023, except for the rollforward, which is effective for the current fiscal year 2024.
